game.name: Super Cowboy Run
game.description:
The awesome fun adventure challenge is out and you have got a chance to play the role of a super cow boy! Hey boys! You would not like to miss out this opportunity especially at a time when you want something new and challenging to try. We have got you covered with a brand new online game where you have to help a super coy boy to run and cover the maximum distance possible over the platform that is full of deadly obstacles. Make sure to grab coins before the time runs out.

Your objective in this HTML5 platform game is to kill monsters, and collect coins and lives and go as far as possible. Many dangerous skeletons, trolls, wild dogs and even bombs will be there to stop him from moving forward. You have limited bullets and 3 lives to use so try to be careful to discover more fun opportunities in this addicting running game. Make sure that your hero is loaded with enough bullets before going forward. Keep your character away from the bomb-dropping crows, feral dogs, and an army of goblins!

Takedown as many enemies as you can while guiding him to jump over the rogue wagon wheels! No helping hand you can see over this land where the number of enemies is very big. All you need to do is just open your eyes all the time to go as far as possible. Track your lives at the top left corner of the screen while you can see how many bullets are left at your hand by looking at just next to your lives! The middle screen will show you the clock and money you have earned so far.
